Small dataset referencing the current date

Source: R/demo-data.R
demo_data.Rd

Small dataset referencing the current date

demo_data(n = 10, by = "-2 month")

Arguments

n

number of rows to return
by

string indicating the unit of time between dates in seq.Date(..., by = )

Examples

demo_data()
#> # A tibble: 10 x 5
#>    group     x     y     z date      
#>    <chr> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <date>    
#>  1 a       101    10     1 2020-11-21
#>  2 a       102    20     0 2020-09-22
#>  3 b       103    30     1 2020-07-24
#>  4 b       104    40     0 2020-05-25
#>  5 c       105    50     1 2020-03-26
#>  6 c       106    60     0 2020-01-26
#>  7 d       107    70     1 2019-11-27
#>  8 d       108    80     0 2019-09-28
#>  9 e       109    90     1 2019-07-30
#> 10 e       110   100     0 2019-05-31
